meanings.definition: A large deer with antlers found in northern regions.
meanings.sent1: The reindeer grazed peacefully in the snowy forest.
meanings.sent2: In the Arctic, reindeer are well-adapted to the cold climate.
meanings.sent3: The reindeer tried to ice skate with its antlers, causing quite a spectacle.
meanings.sent4: She moved gracefully through the crowd, her presence as striking as a reindeer in the wilderness.
meanings.sent5: The image of the majestic reindeer against the white snow was truly breathtaking.

meanings.definition: A domesticated variety of this animal used for pulling sleds.
meanings.sent1: Santa's reindeer eagerly pulled his sleigh through the night sky.
meanings.sent2: Children love to imagine Santa's reindeer flying around the world on Christmas Eve.
meanings.sent3: The reindeer decided to take a break and go for a joyride on the sled.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to succeed was as strong as a team of reindeer pulling a heavy load.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the bells on the reindeer's harness filled the air with holiday cheer.
